API’s¶

This section aims to provide a detailed description of all the API’s in the library.

  • SQL Tables
    • Blocks
    • Transactions
    • Uncles
    • Receipts
    • Logs
    • Traces
  • Command Line Interface (CLI)
    • Group –> ether_sql.py
      • Command –> ether_sql.py scrape_data
      • Group –> ether_sql.py ether
      • Group –> ether_sql.py sql
